comments.raw_text:
I have a html file on my mac (running OSX 10.6.8). In my browser, I select File-Print, and then in the print dialog box select PDF->SaveAsPDF. The PDF is generated. I look at the generated PDF in Preview, and also on other computers.

When I use Firefox 8.0b8 to generate the PDF, the first page in the PDF file is wrapping text correctly, but all subsequent pages do not wrap text, so text continue off the edge of the page and is lost.

When I use Chrome 15.0.874.106 to generate the PDF, all pages in the PDF file wrap text correctly, so no text is lost.



This is the same identical html file locally on the same machine. As far as I can tell, the print dialog box is identical each time.
